summary: My best effort at creating an insanely good looking Nord chick.
descriptionHtml:
HOWDY HO SKYRIMERS!

Due to a serious case of \"restartitis\", I\'ve pretty much lived in the character creation menu for the past month. I\'ve experimented with the races and created tons of characters. Strangely enough, I never actually made a Nord, male nor female, until now. 

... and I\'m quite happy with the result. 

I present to you: Meriel!

MODS:
The screenshots are taken with the mod \"XCE - Xenius Character Enhancement\" installed.
I would recommend it, but you should be fine without.
author: Lerkevei
